Owlhawk:  Deposits in this area?  This whole planet is
coded in a field of energon radiation so strong
prolonged exposure results in slagging.  We can't just
change it in one area.....well as I recall the Vok did
create a safe area by accident when they tried to
destroy Earth in the original Beast Wars, but I
wouldn't suggest repeating that incident.  It nearly
created the aforementioned really big boom.

--- Nic <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Katya: Ah! So it is some kind of necessary evil to
> all of your kind, 
> quiaff? Then what should we do with the deposits in
> this area?
>

> wrote:
> > Owlhawk:  As I said we use it for power.  Besides
